description.value:
This staff is constructed from a magically grown amanita mushroom, with a shaft that spreads into a bright red cap speckled in white. While wielding the staff you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Nature checks to identify fungus.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

  • Cantrip @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.D7ZEhTNIDWDLC2J4]{Puff of Poison}
  • 1st @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.K9gI08enGtmih5X1]{Protector Tree} (resembles giant mushroom, not a tree), @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.jSRAyd57kd4WZ4yE]{Summon Plant or Fungus} (fungus only)
  • 2nd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.K9gI08enGtmih5X1]{Protector Tree} (resembles giant mushroom, not a tree), @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.jSRAyd57kd4WZ4yE]{Summon Plant or Fungus} (fungus only), @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.dileJ0Yxqg76LMvu]{One with Plants} (giant mushroom only)
  • 3rd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.K9gI08enGtmih5X1]{Protector Tree} (resembles giant mushroom, not a tree), @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.GKpEcy9WId6NJvtx]{Stinking Cloud}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.jSRAyd57kd4WZ4yE]{Summon Plant or Fungus} (fungus only), @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.KsWhliKfUs3IpW3c]{Wall of Thorns} (resembles wall of fungus; deals poison damage)
  • 4th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.K9gI08enGtmih5X1]{Protector Tree} (resembles giant mushroom, not a tree), @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.qvwIwJ9QBihy8R0t]{Speak with Plants} (fungus only), @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.jSRAyd57kd4WZ4yE]{Summon Plant or Fungus} (fungus only)
  • 5th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.MlpbeZ61Euhl0d60]{Cloudkill}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.zCcfPS4y5SrZzU2x]{Plant Form} (resemble giant fungus instead of plant, gain fungus trait instead of plant trait; arboreal type only), @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.K9gI08enGtmih5X1]{Protector Tree} (resembles giant mushroom, not a tree), @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.jSRAyd57kd4WZ4yE]{Summon Plant or Fungus} (fungus only)

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.
